message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $14,000. This is a high-quality item that I believe would greatly benefit you, given its value to you is $12,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, $14,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.
